goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 216 KB)
indicator_name: Renewable energy share in the total final energy consumption
target_name: By 2030, increase substantially the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix
un_custodian_agency: International Energy Agency (IEA) United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD) United Nations' inter-agency mechanism on energy (UN Energy) and the SE4ALL Global Tracking Framework Consortium
computation_definitions: A megawatt hour (Mwh) is equal to 1,000 Kilowatt hours (Kwh). It is equal to 1,000 kilowatts of electricity used continuously for one hour. It is about equivalent to the amount of electricity used by about 330 homes during one hour.
source_organisation_1: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy
source_url_text_1: Renewable electricity by local authority, 2014 to 2019
